Comment:
When Ada pre- and post-conditions are used, \
together with the SPARK subset of the language, formal methods can formally \
verify compliance of the implementation with these contracts.

GNATmetric can compute and report metrics, such as \
code size, comment percentage, cyclomatic complexity, unit nesting, and \
loop nesting. These can then be compared with standards.

GNAT Studio supports code \
display and navigation. GNAT SAS can identify likely error locations in the \
code. This supports potential software error detection and analysis \
throughout the code.

Ada's strong typing, together with \
its contract-based programming support, provides increased assurance to \
demonstrate that the software interfaces are correct. This can help \
improve software-to-software integration testing.
